Name: Shark Bite
Instructions: BLEND first 3 ingredients with scoop crushed ice and pour into glass. POUR grenadine around edge of the drink. Do not stir before serving.
Review: More about the name and visual appearance than flavour. If not making for yourself then instruct the drinker to stir with the straw - this ruins the appearance but is essential for balance.
Nutrition: One serving of Shark Bite contains 290 calories
